#mermaid-1769884724856{font-family:"trebuchet ms",verdana,arial,sans-serif;font-size:16px;fill:#000000;}@keyframes edge-animation-frame{from{stroke-dashoffset:0;}}@keyframes dash{to{stroke-dashoffset:0;}}#mermaid-1769884724856 .edge-animation-slow{stroke-dasharray:9,5!important;stroke-dashoffset:900;animation:dash 50s linear infinite;stroke-linecap:round;}#mermaid-1769884724856 .edge-animation-fast{stroke-dasharray:9,5!important;stroke-dashoffset:900;animation:dash 20s linear infinite;stroke-linecap:round;}#mermaid-1769884724856 .error-icon{fill:#552222;}#mermaid-1769884724856 .error-text{fill:#552222;stroke:#552222;}#mermaid-1769884724856 .edge-thickness-normal{stroke-width:1px;}#mermaid-1769884724856 .edge-thickness-thick{stroke-width:3.5px;}#mermaid-1769884724856 .edge-pattern-solid{stroke-dasharray:0;}#mermaid-1769884724856 .edge-thickness-invisible{stroke-width:0;fill:none;}#mermaid-1769884724856 .edge-pattern-dashed{stroke-dasharray:3;}#mermaid-1769884724856 .edge-pattern-dotted{stroke-dasharray:2;}#mermaid-1769884724856 .marker{fill:#666;stroke:#666;}#mermaid-1769884724856 .marker.cross{stroke:#666;}#mermaid-1769884724856 svg{font-family:"trebuchet text,#mermaid-1769884724856 span{fill:#000000;color:#000000;}#mermaid-1769884724856 .node rect,#mermaid-1769884724856 .node circle,#mermaid-1769884724856 .node ellipse,#mermaid-1769884724856 .node ALL layers
üìã Layer 7: Policies & Awareness (Human Layer)
Security Policies & Procedures
Security Awareness Training
Incident Response Plan
Audit & Compliance
üßë‚Äçüíº Layer 6: Identity & Access (Authentication Layer)
Multi-Factor Authentication - MFA
Single Sign-On - SSO
Privileged Access Management - PAM
Zero Trust Architecture
üîê Layer 5: Data Security (Information Protection)
Data Encryption at Rest
Data Loss Prevention - DLP
Database Activity Monitoring
Access Controls - RBAC/ABAC
üë§ Layer 4: Application Security (Software Layer)
Input Validation
Secure Coding Practices
Code Analysis - SAST/DAST
Application Sandboxing
üíª Layer 3: Endpoint Security (Host Protection)
Antivirus/EDR
Host-based Firewall
Encryption - FDE/BitLocker
Patch Management
üõ°Ô∏è Layer 2: Network Security (Internal Segmentation)
Internal Firewalls
VLANs & Subnets
Network Access Control - NAC
DMZ Isolation
üåê Layer 1: Perimeter Security (External Boundary)
Internet Edge Firewall
IDS/IPS
DDoS Protection
Web Application Firewall - WAF

Data, Systems, Users
